context: can this be played on the T.V or do you need a special box?
response: No special box required. The game can be played on the TV.

context: How much violence is in this? I know its rated 10+ but when my kids are playing, it seems there is a lot and I shouldn't be letting them play this.
response: it does not seem violent to me. the violence is not graphic.  my 7 and 11 yr old girls love the game. it is totaly ur discretion on wheter u should let them play.

context: Does flightstick  Pro USB 4 have adjustable spring and is it x-y centered
response: my son has yet to use it since he is unable to load the game onto his laptop, so unfortunately I cnt help

context: Will this game work on a windows 7 home premium?
response: Yes it works with windows 7. Also works with Windows 8

context: i have winwdows 8.. it is not being recognized.. i can see it devices and printers section on control panel. it is not letting me use it.. help please
response: Be sure you are not plugged into a usb 3.0 plug which is blue. Also for whatever reason if u have the ps3 version it doesn't work on pc.

context: Just received a new one. Took it out of the package, plugged the charger cord in, and the controller didn't turn on. What do I do?
response: try letting it charge overnight until the red lights stop flashing then unplug it press the clear ps3 button to activate usage then see if it starts working.

context: is this keyboard wireless? does anybody know about a woreless gaming keyboard. or any wireless keyboard good for league?
response: This keyboard is not wireless. I don't use wireless keyboards or mice for gaming so I can't respond to the second question.
There should not be a reason why it wouldn't.

context: How much cussing is in the audio?  Have young kids around.
response: The language is very minimal if any

context: Are the codes for the game and the extra DLC seperate?
response: There is only one code for reaper of souls which enable you to play chapter 5 and adventure mode. You need the diablo 3 game to play this though

context: Why is BF4 on the XB1 $20 cheaper than BF4 on PS4?
response: Because XB1 sucks and PS4 is better

response: Wow it's been years since i played ocarina but last time i  remember, i dont think so but like i said its been years so you can probably ask another

context: Does it work  0n Vista laptop, need to know if it will work on my system.
response: Not sure about vista as i run win 7. Check the system requirements in the ad ..should tell you there.

context: Do you need two or more copies of the game to play co-op or can you play co-op with just one?
My grandkids have a WII it is not a WII U.  This starter pack will work on it?  and then which characters will work?
response: Yes this is the one for the WII! Not the Wii U. You can buy characters for the Disney Infinity. Make sure they don't say Wii u or Disney Infinity 2.0 on them!

context: Can this be plugged into a usb adapter wall charger like an iPhone? or does this have to be charged only by the PS3 usb?? i want charge without ps3 on
response: Yes it can charge without using the PS3 I use my surround sound reciever to charge my controllers. iPhone chargers work as well.

context: Does this come with drive motor and drive laser?
response: This is the complete drive. You simply swap the old one out with this one. All drive components are included.

context: does "2-pack set" mean 2 or 4 analog sticks? How many come in one order?
response: 1 set of 2 sticks. They are awesome--far better than the stock PS4 analogs.

context: Does the PC disc have the code in a paper or in the disk? I don't have DVD reader and the disc version is cheaper than the PC download code. Thanks
